item.description:
PARTY HARD till the MONSTERS are no more!!


Come join the MONSTER Girls full of energy after the CFL Criterium Cup race.
MONSTER Energy drink and City Beverages are sponsoring the CFL Criterium Cup. Creating synergy to establish themselves as the energy drink of extreme sports!

The Event will take place at the Mystic Dunes Resort and Golf Club. There will be time trials prior to the Halloween “Monster” Bash, sponsored exclusively by City Beverages and Monster Energy Drink the night of the 31st.

Mystic Dunes is giving awesome rates (starting @ $69) these weekend! Make sure you mention promo code "cflcriteriumcup"

group.name: The Bike and Social Club (Worcester & surrounding areas)

item.name: “Monster” Bash
